titleStmt.title: A godly and frutefull sermon, made at Maydestone in the county of Kent the fyrst sonday in Lent, in the presence of the most reuerend father in God Thomas archbishop of Canterbury. &c. / by M. Thomas Cole scholemayster there, againste dyuers erronious opinions of the Anabaptistes and others.
titleStmt.author: Cole, Thomas, d. 1571.

titleStmt.title: A godly and frutefull sermon, made at Maydestone in the county of Kent the fyrst sonday in Lent, in the presence of the most reuerend father in God Thomas archbishop of Canterbury. &c. / by M. Thomas Cole scholemayster there, againste dyuers erronious opinions of the Anabaptistes and others.
titleStmt.author: Cole, Thomas, d. 1571.

notesStmt.note: Colophon, E₄r, reads: Imprinted at London by Reginalde Wolfe. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Imperfect: D₆ torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
